headline: Strategy Buys Just 130 More Bitcoin. Why Else the Stock Is Tumbling.
summary: After going a week without buying Bitcoin,  Strategy  made another purchase.  In a securities filing Monday, the world’s largest corporate holder of  Bitcoin  disclosed that it had bought just 130 tokens in the nearly two-week period from Nov. 17 to Nov. 30.  The $11.7 million purchase brought Strategy’s total holdings to 650,000 Bitcoins, acquired for roughly $48.38 million in total.

content.title: Strategy Buys Just 130 More Bitcoin. Why Else the Stock Is Tumbling.
content.summary: After going a week without buying Bitcoin,  Strategy  made another purchase.  In a securities filing Monday, the world’s largest corporate holder of  Bitcoin  disclosed that it had bought just 130 tokens in the nearly two-week period from Nov. 17 to Nov. 30.  The $11.7 million purchase brought Strategy’s total holdings to 650,000 Bitcoins, acquired for roughly $48.38 million in total.

headline: Bitcoin dips below $85,000 in crypto currency rout
summary: Bitcoin and companies tied to cryptocurrencies extended a nearly two-month swoon Monday, tracking with a broader market sell-off in technology companies that many see as overvalued.  Bitcoin, which soared to a record $126,210.50 on Oct. 6 according to crypto trading platform Coinbase, slid more than 7% to below $85,000.  Stocks across the crypto industry tumbled, with Coinbase Global sinking 4% and online trading platform Robinhood Markets losing 5.2%.

content.title: Bitcoin dips below $85,000 in crypto currency rout
content.summary: Bitcoin and companies tied to cryptocurrencies extended a nearly two-month swoon Monday, tracking with a broader market sell-off in technology companies that many see as overvalued.  Bitcoin, which soared to a record $126,210.50 on Oct. 6 according to crypto trading platform Coinbase, slid more than 7% to below $85,000.  Stocks across the crypto industry tumbled, with Coinbase Global sinking 4% and online trading platform Robinhood Markets losing 5.2%.

headline: Is It Worth Investing in Robinhood Markets (HOOD) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?

Bitcoin, which soared to a record $126,210.50 on Oct. 6 according to crypto trading platform Coinbase, slid 11.8% to below $85,000. headline: Bitcoin dips tumbles below $85,000 in crypto rout
summary: Bitcoin and companies tied to cryptocurrencies extended a nearly two-month swoon Monday, tracking with a broader market sell-off in technology companies that many see as overvalued.  Bitcoin slid 6.5% after being down nearly 12% earlier in the day, settling in just above $85,000.  The most-traded cryptocurrency is down about 33% since hitting a record $126,210.50 on Oct. 6, according to crypto trading platform Coinbase.

headline: Already Competing With Kashi: Robinhood VP
summary: Robinhood recently announced a new step into prediction markets. The company is teaming up with Susquehanna to launch a CFTC-licensed futures and derivatives exchange. JB Mackenzie, Vice President and General Manager of Futures and International at Robinhood Markets talks about entering a crowded field that includes players like Kalshi and how it's navigating rising tensions among rivals on "Bloomberg Markets" with Katie Greifeld.

content.title: Already Competing With Kashi: Robinhood VP
content.description: Robinhood recently announced a new step into prediction markets. The company is teaming up with Susquehanna to launch a CFTC-licensed futures and derivatives exchange. JB Mackenzie, Vice President and General Manager of Futures and International at Robinhood Markets talks about entering a crowded field that includes players like Kalshi and how it's navigating rising tensions among rivals on "Bloomberg Markets" with Katie Greifeld.

headline: Heard on the Street Recap: Crypto Blues
summary: What Happened in Markets Today Confidence in crypto is melting. Bitcoin fell 6.4%, its largest daily decrease since March 3, according to Dow Jones Market Data. The decline hurt shares of crypto-focused companies including Coinbase, Robinhood and Strategy, each of which was down at least 3%.

headline: Is It Too Late to Consider Robinhood Shares After International Expansion and 240% Rally?
summary: Wondering if Robinhood Markets is still a good value after its meteoric rise? You are not alone, as plenty of investors are questioning whether the current price reflects opportunity or renewed risk. The stock has surged an impressive 11.8% in the last week, bouncing back from a 12.5% dip over the past month. The year-to-date return sits at 225.8% and one-year gains reach 241.5%. In recent weeks, headlines have focused on Robinhood’s ambitious expansion into international markets and new...
